afest.datastructures.tree.decision

Class DecisionTree<R extends java.io.Serializable,C extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • afest.datastructures.tree.decision.DecisionTree<R,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - Type used to identify features in points.
    C - Type of objects contained in the leafs.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DecisionTree<R extends java.io.Serializable,C extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class implementing a decision tree.

        public DecisionTree(DTNode<R,C> root)
        Create a Decision tree with the given root node.

    • Method Detail

      • classify

        public <T extends IPoint<R>> C classify(T element)
        Return the content of the leaf reached by the element when descending the decision tree. Convention is that if the split returns true, the right child is visited.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of points extending IPoint.
        Parameters:
        element - element to get the label for.
        Returns:
        the label of the leaf reached by the element when descending the decision tree.

      • getLeaf

        public <T extends IPoint<R>> DTNode<R,C> getLeaf(T element)
        Return the leaf node reached when descending the tree according to the given element. Convention is that if the split returns true, the right child is visited.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of points extending IPoint.
        Parameters:
        element - element to reach the leaf node for.
        Returns:
        the leaf node reached when descending the tree according to the given element.
